name: Heist (itch) (Borax Kid)
description:
Heist

Heist is a stealth game prototype I did in 2 months (december 2017 - january 2018) for my game development course.

Your mission is to steal from the Vault of a guarded manor.

Enemies can shoot at you if they detect you, but you don't have a weapon, you can only perform take-downs if you're close enough.

A lot of features I wanted to implement are either missing or somewhat buggy. I also didn't have time to finish the level so there are lots of empty rooms. (No sound detection, guards will sometime clip to the upper floor ...)
